data.en_hint: The house cost has gone up.
data.content_game_1: The house cost has gone up.
data.answer_en_hint: The house cost has gone up.

data.trans: Sống nhờ vào tiền, sống bằng tiền (của ai khác, cái khác)
data.trans_hint: Cha tôi mất việc và chúng tôi đã phải sống bằng tiền trợ cấp.
data.en_hint: My father lost his job and we had to live off welfare.
data.content_game_1: My father lost his job and we had to live off welfare.
data.answer_en_hint: My father lost his job and we had to live off welfare.

data.trans_hint: Tôi băn khoăn không biết khi nào giá dầu sẽ giảm.
data.en_hint: I wonder when the price of oil will go down.
data.content_game_1: I wonder when the price of oil will go down.
data.answer_en_hint: I wonder when the price of oil will go down.

data.trans: Tiếp tục làm gì (mà không hề dừng lại)
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã sống sót cho đến bây giờ, và sẽ tiếp tục làm điều đó mà không cần bạn giúp đỡ.
data.en_hint: I've survived till now, and will go on doing so without help from you.
data.content_game_1: I've survived till now, and will go on doing so without help from you.
data.answer_en_hint: I've survived till now, and will go on doing so without help from you.

data.trans: Quá mệt mỏi (vì điều gì), quá đủ rồi
data.trans_hint: Mình đã quá mệt mỏi với việc chả còn xu nào dính túi suốt mấy tháng qua rồi, giờ mình phải kiếm việc thôi.
data.en_hint: I have had enough of having no money left for the past few months, so I have to find a job now.
data.content_game_1: I have had enough of having no money left for the past few months, so I have to find a job now.
data.answer_en_hint: I have had enough of having no money left for the past few months, so I have to find a job now.

data.trans_hint: Số tiền anh đã đầu tư vào dự án đó sẽ có giá trị về lâu dài.
data.en_hint: The money that you invested into that project will be worth it in the long run.
data.content_game_1: The money that you invested into that project will be worth it in the long run.
data.answer_en_hint: The money that you invested into that project will be worth it in the long run.

data.trans_hint: Tớ đang kiên nhẫn chờ đợi lương tháng này để trả xong xuôi khoản nợ cuối.
data.en_hint: I'm waiting patiently for my salary this month to pay my last debt off.
data.content_game_1: I'm waiting patiently for my salary this month to pay my last debt off.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm waiting patiently for my salary this month to pay my last debt off.

data.trans: Tự mình trang trải (không vay mượn)
data.trans_hint: Cậu phải làm việc cật lực vào để tự trang trải học phí đại học.
data.en_hint: You have to work flat out to pay your way through university.
data.content_game_1: You have to work flat out to pay your way through university.
data.answer_en_hint: You have to work flat out to pay your way through university.

data.trans_hint: Tôi luôn có thói quen để dành ra vài triệu phòng những lúc cần.
data.en_hint: I always have the habit of putting a few million aside in case I need it.
data.content_game_1: I always have the habit of putting a few million aside in case I need it.
data.answer_en_hint: I always have the habit of putting a few million aside in case I need it.

data.trans_hint: Dù có khá giả đến đâu, cậu ta cũng nên tiết kiệm cho tương lai sau này vì không ai biết được tương lai sẽ ra sao.
data.en_hint: No matter how rich he is, he should save up for the future as we don't know what the future holds.
data.content_game_1: No matter how rich he is, he should save up for the future as we don't know what the future holds.
data.answer_en_hint: No matter how rich he is, he should save up for the future as we don't know what the future holds.

data.content: stand on your own two feet
data.trans_hint: Đã đến lúc cậu phải rời ba mẹ và tự lực cánh sinh để kiếm sống rồi.
data.en_hint: It's time you left your parents and stood on your own feet to earn a living.
data.content_game_1: It's time you left your parents and stood on your own feet to earn a living.
data.answer_en_hint: It's time you left your parents and stood on your own feet to earn a living.
